languages.text:
Grants the wielder:
<indent=5%>+10% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}</indent>
<indent=5%>−10 to enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} when {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}</indent>
